title: Advanced Computing Concepts
description: Advanced topics in applied computing including design patterns, scalable architectures, and professional practice.

title: Advanced Software Engineering
description: Software lifecycle management, agile processes, testing strategies, and delivery pipelines for enterprise-scale systems.

title: Internet Applications and Distributed Systems
description: Design and evaluation of scalable, distributed applications for the modern internet, covering microservices and event-driven architectures.

title: Advanced Systems Programming
description: Low-level programming, concurrency, and performance engineering for high-reliability systems.

title: Advanced Database Topics
description: Advanced topics in relational, NoSQL, and distributed databases with emphasis on optimization and data governance.

title: Networking and Data Security
description: Network protocols, secure architecture design, threat modeling, and compliance considerations for enterprise environments.

title: Applied Machine Learning
description: Hands-on machine learning with emphasis on applied modeling, evaluation, and deployment in cloud environments.

title: Cloud and DevOps Engineering
description: Infrastructure-as-code, container orchestration, and continuous delivery practices tailored to applied computing projects.

title: Data Analytics for Business
description: Analytics lifecycle, dashboarding, and translating technical insight into business strategy for stakeholders.

title: Human-Centered Computing
description: User-centered design, accessibility, and evaluation methods for applied software products.

title: Applied Computing Project
description: Capstone project or co-op placement applying MAC competencies to an industry problem.

title: Finance in a Global Perspective
description: Financial principles, valuation, and budgeting for technology initiatives in global markets.

title: Marketing Strategy for Technology Ventures
description: Market analysis, positioning, and go-to-market planning for software products and services.

title: Managing for Organizational Effectiveness
description: People management, leadership styles, and organizational behaviour for technical leaders.
